answerText: systemic lupus erythematosus[10] The symptoms of this other autoimmune disorder imitates another disease that is caused by the buildup of uric acid crystals. It causes buildup of crystals of calcium pyrophosphate dihydrate.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | 1. Chicago A - MIT B | 5 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This autoimmune disorder causes a distinctive butterfly rash and occurs nine times more frequently in females than in males. For 10 points each: [10] Name this disorder that causes inflammation, arthritis, rashes, and fever.
